patthana16.22:1.1: Kusalaṃ cittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.22:2.1: Kusalaṃ nocittānuparivattiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca … (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa. (Ete saṃkhittā, dukattayaṃ cittadukasadisaṃ.)
